meanings.definition: The practice of photographing celestial objects and phenomena.
meanings.sent1: Astrophotography allows us to capture stunning images of stars and galaxies.
meanings.sent2: Many people enjoy astrophotography as a hobby to photograph the night sky.
meanings.sent3: When I tried astrophotography for the first time, I accidentally captured a shooting star!
meanings.sent4: Her passion for astrophotography shines as brightly as the stars she photographs.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of astrophotography is like painting with light in the vast canvas of the universe.

meanings.definition: The art or technique of capturing images of stars, planets, and other astronomical objects using photography.
meanings.sent1: Astrophotography requires patience and precision to capture the wonders of the night sky.
meanings.sent2: Professional astronomers often use astrophotography to document their observations of celestial bodies.
meanings.sent3: During the astrophotography workshop, we learned how to adjust camera settings for better shots.
meanings.sent4: His dedication to astrophotography is as clear as the images of distant planets he captures.
meanings.sent5: Through astrophotography, we can glimpse the beauty and mysteries of the cosmos.
